title: GS1 Style Guide
description: Sets rules and conventions for grammatical style, naming conventions, figure and table use etc. to improve the quality and consistency of all GS1 documentation
relevanceToISA: ISA advisory outputs must align to GS1 editorial standards to ensure credibility with GS1 stakeholders, reduce review friction, and make deliverables GS1-grade for leadership and standards development audiences.
